text: Bridge of Dragons is a 1999 American Bulgarian romantic action movie directed by Isaac Florentine and starring Dolph Lundgren, Jo Kendall, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Valerie Chow, Scott L. Schwartz, Nikolay Binev. ==Other websites== * * Category:1999 action movies Category:1999 romance movies Category:American action movies Category:American romance movies Category:Bulgarian movies Category:Movies directed by Isaac Florentine
title: Bridge of Dragons
